title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Streamlining Active Directory Migration with AWS Hybrid Managed AD (SEC232)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS 混合托管 AD 简化 Active Directory 迁移 (SEC232)
abstract: As organizations modernize infrastructure, maintaining existing identity systems while moving to cloud creates significant operational challenges. Join this focused talk with Deloitte on how they approached migration of AD-dependent workloads to the cloud and how they simplify and accelerate migrations using Hybrid Managed AD. We'll examine technical solutions for common roadblocks including trust relationships, reconfiguring access control, and maintaining security controls spanning multi-cloud environments. Learn practical strategies for implementing Hybrid Active Directory without disrupting workflows.
abstract_cn: 随着组织现代化基础设施，在迁移到云的同时维护现有身份系统会带来重大运营挑战。加入 Deloitte 的这场专题讲座，了解他们如何处理依赖 AD 的工作负载迁移到云，以及如何使用混合托管 AD 简化和加速迁移。我们将探讨常见障碍的技术解决方案，包括信任关系、重新配置访问控制以及维护跨多云环境的安全控制。学习在不中断工作流程的情况下实施混合 Active Directory 的实用策略。

presenter.name: Alex Guenther
presenter.title: Digital Controls, Automation, & AI Sr. Consultant
